body:
In a lightweight manner you can take this for a spin in [Glide](http://github.com/Masterminds/glide) right now. You can set a `ref` that's a SemVer based tag. For example, if you're using Kubernetes you could set a `ref` of `v1.0.5` and it will check it out properly.

We don't yet have version constraints or anything fancy. But, it's coming per user request.

People are using this today to choose specific versions of SemVer tagged projects.
